ivardefs.name: basedOn_
ivardefs.desc: A plan, proposal or order that is fulfilled in whole or in part by this event.

ivardefs.name: category
ivardefs.desc: Indicates where the medication is expected to be consumed or administered.

ivardefs.name: context
ivardefs.desc: The encounter or episode of care that establishes the context for this MedicationStatement.

ivardefs.name: dateAsserted
ivardefs.desc: The date when the medication statement was asserted by the information source.

ivardefs.name: derivedFrom_
ivardefs.desc: Allows linking the MedicationStatement to the underlying MedicationRequest, or to other information that supports or is used to derive the MedicationStatement.

ivardefs.name: dosage_
ivardefs.desc: Indicates how the medication is/was or should be taken by the patient.

ivardefs.name: identifier_
ivardefs.desc: Identifiers associated with this Medication Statement that are defined by business processes and/or used to refer to it when a direct URL reference to the resource itself is not appropriate. They are business identifiers assigned to this resource by the p

ivardefs.name: informationSource
ivardefs.desc: The person or organization that provided the information about the taking of this medication. Note: Use derivedFrom when a MedicationStatement is derived from other resources, e.g. Claim or MedicationRequest.

ivardefs.name: note_
ivardefs.desc: Provides extra information about the medication statement that is not conveyed by the other attributes.

ivardefs.name: partOf_
ivardefs.desc: A larger event of which this particular event is a component or step.

ivardefs.name: reasonCode_
ivardefs.desc: A reason for why the medication is being/was taken.

ivardefs.name: reasonReference_
ivardefs.desc: Condition or observation that supports why the medication is being/was taken.

ivardefs.name: status
ivardefs.desc: A code representing the patient or other source's judgment about the state of the medication used that this statement is about.  Generally, this will be active or completed.

ivardefs.name: statusReason_
ivardefs.desc: Captures the reason for the current state of the MedicationStatement.

ivardefs.name: subject
ivardefs.desc: The person, animal or group who is/was taking the medication.

properties.desc: A record of a medication that is being consumed by a patient.   A MedicationStatement may indicate that the patient may be taking the medication now or has taken the medication in the past or will be taking the medication in the future.  The source of thi
